content:
Today I've run through our backlog of issues that don't have a priority label

and compiled this HackMD
https://hackmd.io/93GaFqoYRr6l34H74Nq4TA?view

I've tried to summarize the current state for them to the best of my knowledge. I'd like to drive this list down to 0 but for this I'll probably need support from T-compiler (like, I think some of them don't reproduce anymore because were symptoms of issues fixed elsewhere)
I'll keep this list updated, but if anyone has suggestions or additional comments for more context, don't hesitate to edit the document. It's right there for everyone's use and peruse.
